Name: Assets
Description: Resources owned by the business that have economic value - UPDATED DESCRIPTION

Name: Current Assets
Description: Assets expected to be converted to cash or used within one year

Name: Cash
Description: Money in bank accounts and cash on hand

Name: Accounts Receivable
Description: Money owed to the business by customers

Name: Inventory
Description: Goods available for sale or materials used in production

Name: Prepaid Expenses
Description: Expenses paid in advance such as insurance or rent

Name: Short-term Investments
Description: Investments expected to be converted to cash within one year

Name: New Current Asset
Description: This is a new asset account added during import

Name: Fixed Assets
Description: Long-term assets used in business operations

Name: Equipment
Description: Machinery and equipment used in operations - UPDATED DESCRIPTION
